item.title: 批发通胀意外下降，国债大涨
item.description: 新的批发通胀数据低于预期，巩固了对降息的押注，国债随之上涨。【原文：Treasuries rose after a fresh reading on wholesale inflation came in weaker than expected, cementing bets on interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 美国生产者价格意外下降，为 4 月以来首次下降
item.description: 8 月份美国批发通胀率意外下降，为四个月来首次，这为美联储降息提供了更多理由。【原文：US wholesale inflation unexpectedly declined in August for the first time in four months, adding to the case for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 战争尚未结束，莱茵金属首席执行官支持盈利目标
item.description: 莱茵金属股份公司（Rheinmetall AG）首席执行官 Armin Papperger 表示，在精简和扩大弹药生产的帮助下，他有信心实现 2030 年盈利和收入的宏伟目标。【原文：Rheinmetall AG Chief Executive Officer Armin Papperger said he’s confident about achieving ambitious 2030 targets for profitability and revenue, helped by the streamlining and expansion of its ammunition production.】

item.title: 施莱格尔表示，如有必要，瑞士央行将毫不犹豫地再次降息
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）表示，如果真的需要将借贷成本降至零以下，瑞士国家银行不会回避。【原文：The Swiss National Bank won’t shirk from cutting borrowing costs below zero if such a move is really called for, President Martin Schlegel said.】

item.title: 贝恩将以 40 亿美元将中国数据中心出售给 HEC 集团
item.description: 贝恩资本同意将其在中国的数据中心出售给深圳市东阳光实业有限公司，交易价值约为 40 亿美元。【原文：Bain Capital agreed to sell its data centers in China to Shenzhen Dongyangguang Industry Co. in a transaction valued at about $4 billion.】

item.title: 金风科技计划斥资 27 亿美元建设内蒙古项目
item.description: 全球最大的风力涡轮机制造商金风科技股份有限公司（Goldwind Science & Technology Co.【原文：Goldwind Science & Technology Co., the world’s largest wind-turbine maker, plans to invest about 18.9 billion yuan ($2.7 billion) on a wind power project in Inner Mongolia, as it seeks to boost its competitiveness and profits.】

item.title: 巴西通胀降温，降息仍在数月之后
item.description: 巴西的月通胀率在 8 月份有所下降，原因是电力和食品成本下降，这让对价格疲惫不堪的购物者松了一口气。【原文：Brazil’s monthly inflation rate declined in August, falling on lower electricity and food costs that served as a relief to price weary shoppers.】

item.title: 苹果将 iPhone Air 称作未来，但专业机型更胜一筹
item.description: 本周二，苹果公司举行了本年度最盛大的产品发布会，推出了四款全新的 iPhone 机型、智能手表阵容的全面更新以及 AirPods 的更新。以下是我的收获。【原文：Apple held its biggest product launch event of the year on Tuesday, ushering in four new iPhone models, an end-to-end refresh of its smartwatch lineup and updated AirPods. Here are my takeaways.】

item.title: 优步在打车应用中增加乔比的刀片直升机行程
item.description: Uber Technologies Inc. 的客户最早将于明年在 Uber 应用程序中直接预订 Blade 的直升机和水上飞机服务，这是该打车公司与 Joby Aviation Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. customers will be able to book Blade’s helicopter and seaplane services directly within the Uber app as early as next year, as part of an expansion of the ride-hailing company’s partnership with Joby Aviation Inc.】

item.title: 英伟达支持 PsiQuantum 完成 10 亿美元融资，估值 70 亿美元
item.description: 量子计算初创公司PsiQuantum Corp.从包括英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）、卡塔尔投资局（Qatar Investment Authority）和麦格理资本（Macquarie Capital）在内的投资者处融资10亿美元，该轮融资对该公司的估值为70亿美元。【原文：The quantum computing startup PsiQuantum Corp. raised $1 billion from investors including Nvidia Corp., Qatar Investment Authority and Macquarie Capital in a round that values the company at $7 billion.】

item.title: Lyft 在亚特兰大推出自动驾驶汽车，配备安全驾驶员
item.description: Lyft 公司正在亚特兰大试运行自动驾驶汽车，车上配有安全驾驶员，这一计划已久的推出旨在帮助其更好地与 Waymo 和优步（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Lyft Inc. is piloting autonomous rides in Atlanta with a safety driver on board, a long-planned launch meant to help it better compete against Waymo and Uber Technologies Inc.】

item.title: 收购灯塔只剩一个竞购者，疑点重重
item.description: 今年 1 月，当 Brighthouse Financial Inc. 寻求出售自己的消息传出时，投资者欢呼雀跃，几乎立即将这家人寿保险公司的股价抬高了 25%。七个月后，值得庆祝的事情已经不多了。【原文：Back in January when news broke that Brighthouse Financial Inc. was seeking to sell itself, investors cheered and almost immediately bid up shares of the life insurer by 25%. Seven months later, there’s not so much to celebrate anymore.】

item.title: SNB 将通过新的讨论摘要揭开利率会议的面纱
item.description: 瑞士国家银行计划发布一份所谓的货币讨论摘要，这可能会成为这个传统上被秘密笼罩的机构的一场沟通革命。【原文：The Swiss National Bank plans to release a so-called summary of monetary discussions in what may become a communication revolution for an institution traditionally shrouded in secrecy.】

item.title: 新加坡石油狂欢中的一个重大库存问题
item.description:
只有少数人敢于估计中国战略采购的规模。然而，对于市场而言，没有什么问题比这更重要了。【原文：

Only a handful venture to estimate the scale of China’s strategic buying. Yet few questions matter more for the market.

】

item.title: 加拿大央行结束量化宽松政策，回购市场再现压力
item.description: 加拿大货币市场再次出现资金问题，促使一些分析师建议央行介入。【原文：Funding issues are cropping up in Canada’s money markets again, prompting some analysts to recommend the central bank step in.】

item.title: Equinor 考虑与 Orsted 合并可再生能源资产
item.description: Equinor ASA 主席 Jon Erik Reinhardsen 表示，公司对与丹麦风能开发商 Orsted A/S 的合作结构持 "开放态度"，包括合并双方可再生资产的可能性。【原文：Equinor ASA Chairman Jon Erik Reinhardsen said the company has an “open mind” about the structure of its partnership with Danish wind developer Orsted A/S, including the possibility of combining their renewable assets.】

item.title: 法国新总理承诺进行重大改革，与反对党合作
item.description: 塞巴斯蒂安-勒科努就任法国总理后，承诺要进行重大改革，在削减预算遭到强烈反对的情况下，他试图让反对党参与到控制国家债务的艰巨任务中来。【原文：Sebastien Lecornu took over as France’s prime minister pledging big changes as he tries to engage opposition parties in the herculean task of reining in the country’s debt amid intense opposition to budget cuts.】

item.title: 挪威 2 万亿美元基金寻求扩大可再生能源投资
item.description: 挪威2万亿美元主权财富基金的全球能源和基础设施主管表示，该基金正寻求扩大可再生能源投资，包括对电网等资产的投资。【原文：Norway’s $2 trillion sovereign wealth fund is looking to expand its renewables investments, including into assets such as power grids, according to its global head of energy and infrastructure.】

item.title: 华尔街无视土耳其数据乐观预期，认为降息步伐放缓
item.description: 全球银行对土耳其央行对通胀风险的乐观前景持怀疑态度，预计周四的降息步伐将有所放缓。【原文：Global banks are skeptical of the Turkish central bank’s sanguine outlook on risks to inflation, expecting a down-shift in the pace of interest-rate cuts on Thursday.】

item.title: 当客户拨打 Klarna 的热线时，人工智能首席执行官会接听电话
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，艾莎-加尼（Aisha Gani）与 Klarna 首席执行官的人工智能化身进行了对话。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Aisha Gani speaks with the AI alter ego of Klarna’s CEO.】

item.title: 糟糕的经济数据让人对美国及其机构产生怀疑
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的一名经济学编辑，今天我们将探讨美国就业的修正史。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at a revisionist history of US employment. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普关税授权进入最高法院快速通道
item.description: 美国最高法院计划于 11 月初就一宗案件进行辩论，以决定唐纳德-特朗普总统第二任期的大部分关税是否合法。【原文：The US Supreme Court is planning arguments for early November in a case to decide whether the bulk of President Donald Trump’s second-term tariffs are legal.】

item.title: 即使遭遇 32 亿美元挤压，空头仍重返 AppLovin
item.description: 做空者再次把目光投向了 AppLovin 公司，尽管在过去六个月里，押注该软件生产商股票的交易商已经蒙受了约 32 亿美元的纸面损失。【原文：Short-sellers are once again setting their sights on AppLovin Corp., even after traders who bet against the software maker’s shares got burned with an estimated $3.2 billion in paper losses over the past six months.】

item.title: 美国房贷利率创 11 个月新低 重启住房融资活动
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率上周降至近一年来的最低点，引发了再融资活动的激增，并鼓励潜在购房者放弃观望。【原文：US mortgage rates declined last week to an almost one-year low, sparking a surge in refinancing activity and encouraging prospective buyers to step off the sidelines.】

item.title: Spotify 为付费用户推出高保真功能
item.description: Spotify Technology SA 正在为付费用户推出更高品质的音效，这是这家流媒体公司为提升其最佳用户的听觉体验而做出的最新努力。【原文：Spotify Technology SA is introducing higher-quality sound for paying subscribers, the streaming company’s latest effort to enhance the listening experience for its best customers.】

item.title: 凯雷警告：降息在即，财政部和美联储角色模糊不清
item.description: 据凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：The Trump administration’s call for steep Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts, coupled with the prospect of higher short-term US debt issuance, risks disrupting the Treasury market and could end up driving longer-term borrowing costs higher, according to the Carlyle Group Inc.】

item.title: 威兹航空关闭维也纳基地以降低成本实现扭亏为盈
item.description: 威兹航空控股公司（Wizz Air Holdings Plc）计划结束在维也纳的运营，因为这家折扣航空公司面临着持续的成本压力，正在缩减其增长雄心。【原文：Wizz Air Holdings Plc plans to end operations in Vienna as the discount carrier, facing persistent cost pressure, scales back its growth ambitions.】

item.title: 在线旅行社 Loveholidays 着眼于首次公开募股，推动英国市场发展
item.description: 在线旅行社 Loveholidays 正准备上市，以利用英国对套餐式假期需求的增长，这可能是伦敦奄奄一息的首次公开募股市场的一剂强心针。【原文：Online travel agent Loveholidays is preparing to go public to take advantage of increased UK demand for packaged holidays, in what could be a pick-me-up for London’s moribund market for initial public offerings.】

item.title: 电子商务经销商 Pattern、支持者在首次公开募股中寻求 3.214 亿美元资金
item.description: Pattern Group Inc.是一家在亚马逊（Amazon.com Inc.）等市场上转售商品的电子商务公司，该公司及其部分投资者正寻求在首次公开募股中筹集高达 3.214 亿美元的资金。【原文：Pattern Group Inc., an e-commerce firm that resells goods on marketplaces such as Amazon.com Inc., and some of its investors are seeking to raise as much as $321.4 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 新成立的 Ardian 基础设施基金将突破 100 亿欧元的目标
item.description: 熟悉情况的人士称，随着投资者在基础设施领域寻找机会，Ardian 公司最新基金的筹资额有望超过 100 亿欧元（117 亿美元）的目标。【原文：Ardian is on track to exceed the €10 billion ($11.7 billion) fundraising target for its latest fund, people familiar with the effort said, as investors look for opportunities in the infrastructure segment.】
